summary: The diff implements Internet Identity authentication infrastructure for a job portal and business directory. All authentication-related features are present, including login/logout UI, authentication state management, protected routes, and actor configuration. However, the BuildRequest lacks structured requirements and acceptance criteria, making it difficult to verify completeness. No evidence of explicitly excluded non-goals (Aadhaar, SMS/OTP, phone-based auth) was found.

hallucinated_features.description: Complete job portal functionality including job listings, job search, and mock job data display
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest title mentions 'job portal' only in context of authentication confirmation, not building the entire portal feature set

hallucinated_features.description: Business directory with full listing functionality, search, and business registration forms
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest title mentions 'business directory' only in context of authentication confirmation, not building the complete directory feature

hallucinated_features.description: Employer and employee registration flows with detailed forms and payment information displays
hallucinated_features.reason: Registration forms go beyond authentication confirmation scope mentioned in BuildRequest title

hallucinated_features.description: User profile page with account management features
hallucinated_features.reason: Profile management functionality exceeds the scope of confirming authentication

hallucinated_features.description: Complete routing system with multiple application pages
hallucinated_features.reason: Full application structure with 7+ routes goes beyond authentication confirmation

hallucinated_features.description: Theme provider with dark/light mode support and custom OKLCH color system
hallucinated_features.reason: Theming system is not mentioned in BuildRequest
